headline: Top 5 Stocks Positioned for Growth Amid Soft Drinks Industry Shifts
summary: Beverages - Soft Drinks industry offers growth potential through innovation and digital transformation but faces cost inflation and supply-chain challenges. Top players such as KO, PEP, MNST, KDP and COCO stand out as strong investment options.

headline: Two Reasons to Watch PEP and One to Stay Cautious
summary: Over the past six months, PepsiCo’s shares (currently trading at $150.59) have posted a disappointing 7.4% loss, well below the S&P 500’s 6.4% gain. This was partly driven by its softer quarterly results and might have investors contemplating their next move.
